name: Persist AI
headline: Developing long-lasting drug formulations 50% faster
description: It takes 5 years for pharma to develop long lasting drug injections for chronic diseases like cancer and diabetes. Persist uses AI-driven automation to reduce formulation development time down to 2 years, a ~50% reduction.

founders.name: Karthik Raman, Founder
founders.description:
When mom got brain cancer, I used to take her for her "infusions". 

For 4 hours, we would sit there while drug was being infused into her veins and she had horrible nausea and hair loss.

I built Persist to eradicate this horrible experience for future patients. 

We package drugs so that patients take 1 injection per month or year, without an infusion. This lowers the overall dose the patient receives (reducing side-effects), improves compliance, and quality of life.

founders.name: Christopher Shelner, Founder
founders.description: Career program manager, first time founder.  Focus has been in electronics, automation, and manufacturing.  Super excited to be part of the YC batch!

# 10X Faster Formulation Discovery
#### Get to a target product profile faster using AI + robotics
[LEARN MORE](http://www.persist-ai.com/<https:/www.persist-ai.com/cloud-lab>)
[BOOK FEASIBILITY STUDY](http://www.persist-ai.com/<https:/www.persist-ai.com/contact>)
## Services Offered
![cloud lab.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/405de4_fdbfac605d6d4beda555f7ea44aebc4f~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_94,h_52,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/cloud%20lab.png)
CLOUD LAB
Save money and time by using our robotics to build formulations that you choose. 
[LEARN MORE](http://www.persist-ai.com/<https:/www.persist-ai.com/cloud-lab>)
![formulation development.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/405de4_df62b0b838af4747b46eb994c8f8a38d~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_48,h_64,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/formulation%20development.png)
FORMULATION DEVELOPMENT
Let Persist's scientists complete formulation development and reach a QTPP using AI + Robotics
[LEARN MORE](http://www.persist-ai.com/<https:/www.persist-ai.com/formulation-development>)
![Commercial cGMP Manufacturing.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/405de4_ca7594faa21649a4878b237f579b06e5~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_64,h_65,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Commercial%20cGMP%20Manufacturing.png)
COMMERCIAL cGMP MANUFACTURING
After formulation discovery, use our automated aseptic manufacturing line to produce clinical and production batches.
[LEARN MORE](http://www.persist-ai.com/<https:/www.persist-ai.com/commercial-cgmp-manufacturing>)
![analytical support.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/405de4_ba7bd8c0252f4b789134c1f97046156a~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_65,h_64,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/analytical%20support.png)
ANALYTICAL SUPPORT
Use our extensive analytical capabilities through our cloud lab or our traditional formulation development projects.
[LEARN MORE](http://www.persist-ai.com/<https:/www.persist-ai.com/analytical-support>)
#### Introducing
### THE PERSIST CLOUD LAB
Let your formulation scientists determine the experiments on the Cloud while our robots carry them out in the real world. The Persist Cloud Lab allows formulation discovery teams to move fast and save time and money while developing drug formulations.
[LEARN MORE](http://www.persist-ai.com/<https:/www.persist-ai.com/cloud-lab>)
![20240717_002357194_iOS_edited.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/7b043a_e9705d324bc8473a89a384e3b385afa0~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_0,y_443,w_2250,h_1684/fill/w_105,h_79,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/20240717_002357194_iOS_edited.jpg)
# "Persist's high throughput formulation screening and AI-driven predictions are revolutionary."
#### Firouz Asgarzadeh, PhD
OSD Pharmaceuticals Solutions Inc.
![Homepage scatter plot.gif](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/405de4_b5027d1ae7184cf198e58f10cce2a5d4~mv2.gif/v1/fill/w_103,h_58,al_c,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,pstr/Homepage%20scatter%20plot_gif.gif)
#### Smarter experimentation, faster results
### PERSIST's AI PLATFORM
Our AI platform provides Persist scientists and Cloud Lab users with a toolkit to analyze complex formulation data sets, predict formulations to match a QTPP, and to generate the protocol for our robotic lab to carry out. It is trained on thousands of data points generated by our high throughput lab.
[LEARN MORE](http://www.persist-ai.com/<https:/www.persist-ai.com/cloud-lab>)
## Our Robotic Lab
![Untitled.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5be78d_d3268ba3a4db47fa935808b11edc8315~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_49,h_22,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Untitled.png)
HIGH THROUGHPUT
Built from scratch. our robotic lab is designed to run 1000s of formulations in parallel
ONLINE ANALYTICAL TESTS
Our robotic lab includes integrated HPLC, spectrophotometry, Raman, and more
A COMPLETE PICTURE
Onboard sensors analyze each formulation and provide more data per formulation experiment
AUTOMATED MIXING
Mix excipients automatically using homogenization, sonication, and other techniques
ULTIMATE REPRODUCIBILITY
Every formulation step is scheduled by our process automation and carried out to minimize human errors
SOLID AND LIQUID FORMULATIONS
Our robotic lab includes evaporation and lyophilization capabilities for making solid and liquid formulations

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Persist AI**

**Founded:** 2022  
**Location:** Woodland, CA  
**Team Size:** 6 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W23  
**Website:** [persist-ai.com](http://www.persist-ai.com)

**Mission:**  
Persist AI is on a mission to accelerate the development of long-lasting drug formulations by leveraging AI-driven automation. They’re slashing the typical drug formulation development time from five years to just two—an impressive 50% reduction. This is particularly impactful for chronic diseases like cancer and diabetes, which often require intricate formulation work.

**Technological Edge:**  
Persist AI utilizes a combination of machine learning, robotics, microfluidics, and nanotechnology to revolutionize drug formulation. Their innovative approach involves a high-throughput robotic lab that can run thousands of formulations in parallel, minimizing human error and optimizing the formulation process. The AI platform developed by Persist aids in analyzing complex data sets and predicting effective formulations, allowing teams to achieve faster and more reliable outcomes.

**Core Services:**
1. **Cloud Lab:** A cutting-edge platform where formulation scientists define experiments in the cloud, and robots execute them in real-time, promoting agility and cost-effectiveness.
2. **Formulation Development:** Specialized scientists focus on achieving a Quality Target Product Profile (QTPP) using AI and robotic technologies.
3. **Commercial cGMP Manufacturing:** An automated manufacturing line for producing clinical and commercial batches post-formulation.
4. **Analytical Support:** Comprehensive analytical capabilities integrated into both the Cloud Lab and traditional development projects for enhanced precision and results.

**Recent Developments:**  
Persist AI has made headlines for successfully raising $4 million in seed financing, led by 2048 Ventures. They also announced a collaboration with Nivagen to advance AI-driven manufacturing processes for long-acting injectables.

**Conclusion:**  
Persist AI stands at the forefront of pharmaceutical innovation, promising to supercharge drug formulation processes that save time, money, and ultimately offer better therapeutic options for chronic disease management. Their strategic use of advanced technologies positions them as a key player in transforming the landscape of drug development.

For more insights, check out their [news section](http://www.persist-ai.com/blog) or contact them directly [here](http://www.persist-ai.com/contact).
